H0.text: In which year was the ten shilling note withdrawn in the UK following the introduction of the 50p coin . 1968

H1.text: In which year was the ten shilling note withdrawn in the UK following the introduction of the 50p coin . 1969

H2.text: In which year was the ten shilling note withdrawn in the UK following the introduction of the 50p coin . 1971

H3.text: In which year was the ten shilling note withdrawn in the UK following the introduction of the 50p coin . 1970

A4.text: The note ceased to be legal tender in 1970.

A5.text: The note ceased to be legal tender on 22 November 1970.
